website_summaries.verdict: A premium and advanced car alarm system with long range notification capabilities.
pros: Built-in paging unit will announce when the alarm is triggered from up to a mile away
Capable of detecting open doors and theft attempts
cons: Remote has a limited charge when used for the first few times on a new car

customer_reviews.title: Python is good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Python is another awesome product from Directed Electronics and they are very reliable, it was at a very reasonable price so it was even more worth it.It works pretty much on any car, and you should consult a professional installer for installation, not something you should do yourself unless your a professional installer.
customer_reviews.author: jesse r

customer_reviews.title: replacement has been running fine for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my boat. That's right, boat. First one had issues, replacement has been running fine for 3 months now
customer_reviews.author: Teonnie

customer_reviews.title: nice product but remote would not hold charge for more ...
customer_reviews.text: nice product but remote would not hold charge for more than 30 min. (i own a similar model and remote lasts about 2 months). amazon did ship out another unit and remote would not even take charge. talked to python tech help. battery/remote faulty. replacement remote costs more than complete alarm. of course unit is already wired into car so if you buy one charge remote first and proceed from there.
customer_reviews.author: ted rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good starter
customer_reviews.text: Great remote start alarm combo. I have been installing dei products for the past 15 years. They work and are user friendly. Bitwriter makes programing a breeze 2.7 or newer is required.
customer_reviews.author: lalaland

customer_reviews.title: Alarm system overall works great. I had issues with the main LCD remote
customer_reviews.text: Alarm system overall works great. I had issues with the main LCD remote. It would not power on after charging. However, Amazon customer service was great and they sent me a replacement remote. The actual security system works well. So far, I haven't experienced any issues with the alarm system or remote start. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Only problem MTS mode
customer_reviews.text: I love it...but the starter won't work...lights keep blinking 5 times...and the manuel says it needs to b in mts mode....how to do that?
customer_reviews.author: NotSalty

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works well and unit was delivered fast and good condition, only waited a few days! thanks you the fast servcie great system!!! you need to know want you are doingto install, easy to mess up your car, and don't forget your bypass
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have bought viper 5706 previously and looks exactly the same and works the same.
customer_reviews.author: Seferino F.

customer_reviews.title: Range is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Range is not even close to 1/4mile. Sometimes not even a block. Features are good. But that range is probably for a open field in the middle of nowhere. Womp womp
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Live in Alaska and upgraded from an old Astrostart model. I have a 2000 Benz. They had no problems installing and y'all know how pesky mb are. Great product easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Lisette A Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great Alarm/remote start system
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a 2013 Toyota Sequoia. It was quite the extensive install, but once I was able to get it all working, it has worked great. The range is amazing and the battery lasts 2 to 3 months between charges. I love being able to see if my car is locked, started, etc. on the screen. And although the remote is slightly larger than my factory, it still is very portable and hasn't been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with a different key , not the one on the picture
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome alarm for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as a Viper Alarm!! Works up tp about a mile away if parked out in the open, and not in a parking garage. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rory Muskin

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFOR YOU BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This will be my last time buying a DEI product. They DO NOT support the DIY community and they DO NOT warranty there product unless it was purchased and installed by an authorized dealer. Which whose prices are outrageous. To me this is insane giving all the information available on the world wide web. If you can read anyone can do this tedious install. As far as the product goes it works, but I can not get remote start to work in "tach" mode. It works outstanding in "virtual tach" mode. The previous one I replaced with this one, had the same issue and it was installed by an authorized dealer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes works great but one problem just goes into valet mode easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: I like this system alot, the auto dealership i work for installs this same system for over $600, i got a steal. I would recommend someone who knows what they are doing to install it. I have had no problems at all with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: mark carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Best remote start
customer_reviews.text: Install about 2 a week and not one has failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime C

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it was such a go price. I got the and found no instructions, I looked on line but couldn't find it. I finally called the manufacturer and they told me that only professionals install them and couldn't them. I'm pretty handy, but with all those wires and no instructions I decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Received A Used Item . But I Bought A New Item
customer_reviews.text: Sooo. Let's begin , Order a new alarm , Clearly advertise NEW . So happy to open it up and see this NEW alarm system ... Got to open it up and first thing I see , a return slip !!! Lol WTF ... So I decided to inspect it more . Wires was recut and repacked . Lol So I paid for a NEW item only to receive a used return .... What BS is this !!!!
customer_reviews.author: KS-TAC

customer_reviews.title: Directed alarms are the Bee's Knee's
customer_reviews.text: I have been installing directed alarms in cars and trucks for years both professionally and for my self. I have installed many remote starts in stick shifts and believe me when I tell you this is the only brand worth putting in a stick! This alarm system is working perfectly in my focus
customer_reviews.author: Zac S

customer_reviews.title: Great Remote Start/Alarm system
customer_reviews.text: Had All the features I wanted at a price I wanted to pay. Same as Viper 5706v, at a lower cost!
customer_reviews.author: CU52

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect solution to the stubborn factory electronics. I just wish it was easier to install, the quick reference guide doesn't say much.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this 2 way!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Have an older version in my truck and bought this for my girlfriends 2011 Toyota Camry. Install took a few hours and went pretty well. I like this remote better than my Python 7351P remote too, it has a nicer feel to it. I had one issue with it trying to crank the engine too much but that only happened once and it can happen with any remote start. This distance of these remotes are insane, people tend not to believe me how far it reaches until I show them and they are amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Josh C

customer_reviews.title: This is alarm is great. Not sure it works from a mile away
customer_reviews.text: This is alarm is great. Not sure it works from a mile away. Maybe if your on a mountain and were able to see it. For example if your on the opposite side of AZ Mills Mall it wouldnt work I dont think the mall is a mile long. Anyways no dice. Pager does work great shows were product is being tampered with or whatever the situation is. I would buy and put into my other car.
customer_reviews.author: LX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great unit at a great price! May buy another!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage!!!! Worked great for a year now the door locks go on and off all the time unless the seat belt is locked!!! Even warming up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have had this alarm for about 1-2 months now and I am really satisfied with it. The only issue I had is that when i bought the alarm one of the wires wasn't working but my installer that i went through replaced it and i have not had any issues or would have not even known had he not told me. The alarm has a really long range even with obstacles in the way. All in all its a good alarm and I would recommend this to anyone interested in a security system for there car.
customer_reviews.author: Silent

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent features
customer_reviews.text: Directed Electronics nailed it with this Remote Start. The new remotes are much more streamlined and aesthetically pleasing, screen is easy to read and understand, and keypad layout is functional. I installed this in an older Dodge Cummins Diesel pickup, and haven't had any trouble with it. Install is straight forward if you have been installing remote starts for a while. If you haven't done one at all, do your research for your model car and what you'll need. This system is expandable for other sensors as well. Range is pretty good, if you have a line of sight. Within concrete/steel structures it doesn't always send/receive exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Get the bypass module for your car
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm/remote start. Everything is working so far. This is not a DIY alarm install. Needs to be done by professionals because instructions are for professionals and not vague at all. Make sure you buy the corresponding module for this system to function on your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Rubio

customer_reviews.title: decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good alarm system and works like the Viper. I picked toys because I prefer to look of the remote over the other ones. However you won't find a good installation and user manual. What comes with it was meant for seasoned installers. You will need to download the 5704 Viper manuals online. All the colors are the same but explains. everything. The words on the auxiliary connector are very short. You might have to extend them if you wish to do a stealth install. Hence the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Derek

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get product warrantied
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is not an authorized Directed deal , product is only to be sold as an installed product. This item will not be warrantied by directed, if bought here
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

product_meta.title: Python 5706P Responder LC3 SST 2-Way Security with Remote Start System

Remote can confirm commands with tones, vibration, text and icon display
One mile range primary LCD SST remote
